value.title: Elon Musk: Tesla aims to release new version of Full Self-Driving Beta next month with wider access
value.excerpt: Elon Musk says that Tesla aims to release new version of its Full Self-Driving Beta software with “Autosteer on city streets” next month, and it should come with a wider release to more customers. Back in October 2020,

value.title: Robotics division of Uber's Postmates spins out into new company
value.excerpt: The robotics unit of Postmates, a delivery startup that ride-hailing firm Uber Technologies acquired last year, has spun off into a new company called Serve Robotics, the company said on Tuesday.

value.title: Gatik raises $9 million to winterize self-driving box trucks
value.excerpt: Gatik, a company developing autonomous driving technology for short-haul logistics, has raised $9 million in funding.

value.title: Massive Boon In Computer Chip Shortages Will Slam Future Self-Driving Car Rollouts
value.excerpt: Computer chip shortages are hurting automakers, which is exactly what will happen even in the future when self-driving cars start becoming viable, here's why.

value.title: AWS reorganizes DeepRacer League to encourage more newbies
value.excerpt: AWS launched the DeepRacer League in 2018 as a fun way to teach developers machine learning, and it’s been building on the idea ever since. Today, it announced the latest league season with two divisions: Open and Pro.

value.title: Volkswagen and Argo AI Plan to Launch a Self-Driving Electric Taxi in 2025

value.title: Americans Want Self-Driving Cars, But Want Safety First
value.excerpt: Americans are not known for prioritizing road safety. No state currently bans all cell use phone behind the wheel, and two states still allow drivers to text. And the United States consistently lags behind other developed nations,

value.title: COMMENTARY: How robotics are changing jobs in Canada
value.excerpt: One widely cited study estimates that 47 per cent of jobs in the United States are at risk of being replaced by robots and artificial intelligence. Read more: The 5-minute shopping spree.

value.title: Driverless bus hits streets in southern Spain
value.excerpt: A new driverless electric bus has begun operating in the southern Spanish city of Malaga, in a project presented as a first in Europe.

value.title: Aurora acquires a second lidar company in push to bring self-driving trucks to the road
value.excerpt: Aurora, the autonomous vehicle company that recently closed its acquisition of Uber’s self-driving subsidiary, has snapped up another startup.  This time, Aurora is buying OURS Technology, the second lidar startup it has acquired in less than two years.

value.title: Aurora Buys Chip Startup To Cut Laser Lidar Costs For Robot Cars And Trucks
value.excerpt: The self-driving tech developer is acquiring Silicon Valley startup OURS Technology to integrate its lidar sensor into a single chip.

value.title: Mobileye partners with Lohr and Transdev to develop self-driving shuttles
value.excerpt: Mobileye announced that it's partnering with Lohr and Transdev to develop self-driving shuttles for public transportation.

value.title: Why driverless cars are paradise on wheels for some

value.title: SAIC taps Chinese chip startup for self-driving cars
value.excerpt: SAIC is among a list of state-backed automotive majors shifting towards startup chipmaker Horizon Robotics as a domestic substitute for global suppliers.

value.title: EU report warns that AI makes autonomous vehicles ‘highly vulnerable’ to attack
value.excerpt: A European Union Agency for Cybersecurity report says machine learning should be considered part of the autonomous vehicle supply chain.

value.excerpt: When you think of artificial intelligence (AI) and automation, what comes to mind? Maybe you think of self-driving cars or robots performing mundane tasks. But not writing.
